snippet.title: Hyde's Haunt & Seek: Gameplay Trailer (May 2023)
snippet.description:
Spook or be spooked in this ghostly multiplayer horror game! Play as either the mortal Seeker, trying to retrieve prized possessions of the dead, or as Ghosts, using pranks and scares to keep those pesky humans from your prize. It's multiplayer mayhem as ghouls clash with go-getters in a haunted manor!

This game is currently seeking publishing to finish, so if you like what we're doing you can support us by Wishlisting us here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1641040/Hydes_Haunt__Seek/

We're on social media, too!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Smol_Games
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@smol_games

✨ This trailer features four amazing Twitch streamers ✨


CBeeDoodles: https://www.twitch.tv/cbeedoodles
GrinningHazard: https://www.twitch.tv/grinninghazard
MinkTheSatyr: https://www.twitch.tv/minkthesatyr
QueenRowlet: https://www.twitch.tv/queenrowlet
